body:
So a few days ago we were announced about Avicus's second official tournament, Race for Victory! 

Has as anyone got any rumours of teams reforming or disbanding? 

Some key individual players may return and forge a team maybe?

Write away!
body_tagged:
So a few days ago we were announced about Avicus's second official tournament, Race for Victory! 

Has as anyone got any rumours of teams reforming or disbanding? 

Some key individual players may return and forge a team maybe?

Write away!
title: Tournament 2 gossip!
